sys_update_version.name: sp_instance_table_fed934be47b4821004c8d44a516d4365
sys_update_version.payload:
truedefault.custom-widget { background-color: #ffffff; /* White background color for the widget */ border: 1px solid #CCCCCC; /* Light grey border for the widget */ border-radius: 4px; /* Rounded corners */ box-shadow: 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.1); /* Subtle shadow for depth */ margin-bottom: 20px; /* Spacing between widgets */ } .custom-widget .widget-content { padding: 16px; } .custom-widget .alert.alert-danger { border-radius: 3px; margin-bottom: 0; /* To align with the styling of the rest of the widget */ } /* Table styling - this will override default table styles */ .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_body { border-top: none; /* Removes the border from the top of the table */ } .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_header, .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_row { border-left: none; /* Removes the border from the left side of the cells */ border-right: none; /* Removes the border from the right side of the cells */ } .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_cell { border-top: 1px solid #e1e1e1; /* Adds a border to the top of the cell for separation */ } /* Header Title Styling updated to match your requirements */ .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_header { background-color: #0B3D41; /* Dark teal green for the header background */ color: #FFFFFF; /* White color for the text */ } /* Ensuring row and text colors are adjusted */ .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_row { background-color: #FFFFFF; /* Maintaining white background for rows */ color: #333; /* Ensuring text color is dark for readability */ } .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_row:hover { background-color: #E8F4FD; /* Light blue for row hover, adjust if needed */ } .custom-widget .data-table-widget .list2_cell { border-color: #B0DAF1; /* Soft blue for borders, can adjust as needed */ } status,vehicle_make,image51ascmdbdd974be47b4821004c8d44a516d43be9be4b03a47b4821004c8d44a516d433bsp_instance_tableadmin2024-03-11 04:30:51fed934be47b4821004c8d44a516d4365249a969ca4733311004c8d44a516d437249a969ca4733311004c8d44a516d4372sp_instance_table_fed934be47b4821004c8d44a516d4365admin2024-03-11 05:36:40x_1298059_loaner_0_loaner_vehicle_catalog
